overview_of_class: This course provides an introduction to the evolution and current state of the academic literature on American Politics. The first part of the course focuses on political behavior, the second part emphasizes political institutions.
name: American Political Institutions and Behavior
title: WCAS POLI_SCI 410-0-20 American Political Institutions and Behavior

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: This course provides an introduction to the evolution and current state of the academic literature on American Politics. The first part of the course focuses on political behavior, the second part emphasizes political institutions.
